author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
#### PR description:

Original design logic for Overlap Removal: 
   * consider two objects of type A in a correlation condition (two correlation leg), only if neither one of them overlaps (usually in dR) with any object of type B (removal leg)

Add useful LogTrace printouts of the removal-leg object.

#### PR validation:

Ran on MC samples with L1 test menu xml with trigger paths that exploit Overlap Removal grammar.

title: PR12_2  L1T Correlation Conditions in uGT with overlap removal logic - original design
